projects.name: React Quiz App
projects.description: This is a quiz app build with focus on useReducer. The styling is not responsive for tablet or desktop yet, I've just had the time to focus on mobile version

projects.name: Trullo
projects.description: Here can you create projects, add tasks to them. You can also assign users to the tasks. This project follows the CRUD operation. For now, it's just a backend, but frontend will be added later. You can find info to test the endpoints in README.md

projects.name: Todo List TypeScript
projects.description: This is a todo list application built with TypeScript and local storage. It allows users to add, delete, edit and mark tasks as completed.

projects.name: The Job Chaser
projects.description: A job application tracker web app built with React (context & redux) and TypeScript. It allows users to sign up/sign in and search, filter and sort jobs.

projects.name: Todo List
projects.description: A to-do list with focus on backend, built with Node.js, Express and mySQL. It allows users to create, read, update and delete tasks.
